questions.question_text: When this property is set to true, Risk, Entity, and Risk Statement forms are impacted.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer: B. Migrate to Advanced Risk Assessments property
Explanation: When the Migrate to Advanced Risk Assessments[sn_risk_advanced.hide_risk_legacy_lifecycle] property is set to true, it triggers a migration process that updates Risk, Entity, and Risk Statement forms to align with the advanced risk assessment functionality. This property is typically used when upgrading from a previous version of ServiceNow GRC to a version that supports advanced risk assessments.
Source: PDI, explanation provided by Gemini

Selected Answer: A
Tested in PDI
